thread.title: Perfectly located beautiful Hotel
thread.title_full: Perfectly located beautiful Hotel - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Morgane1808
title: Perfectly located beautiful Hotel
text:
The Piccadilly London West End Hotel is a beautiful Hotel with a friendly and helpful staff.
They are always disponible to help you and to answer all your questions.
There is also a spa area with a jacuzzi, hammam and sauna for those who would like to relax a bit.
The bedrooms are beautifully decorated, clean and you have enough space to enjoy a comfortable stay. (As I have been 5x in London, I had never such a "spacefull" room as in this hotel, because normally rooms in London are tiny and tight)
Plus, the Hotel is perfectly located if you want to avoid the underground.
As the piccadilly circus is just 2 Minutes of walk, from there you can join the shopping streets as the oxford street, carnaby street and so on in only maximum 10 minutes of walk.
The Hotel is also located near leicester square, where you can join the covent garden in a 5 minutes walk.
The Big Ben and London eye are a 15 minutes walk away, such as the palace of westminster.
You can also find a lot of theaters, musicals and some bars and lovely restaurants in this area.
I really recommend this Hotel if you want to enjoy a comfortable, relaxfull stay where you can feel like home, and which is near everything you need.
